description.en: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.ar: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.br: Um pergaminho místico que desfaz os efeitos de uma Transmutação de Item. Clique neste pergaminho e use-o em um item transmutado para devolvê-lo à sua aparência original.
description.cns: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.de: Eine mystische Schriftrolle, die die Auswirkungen einer Item Transmutation rückgängig machen kann. Klicke auf diese Schriftrolle und verwende sie auf einem transmutierten Gegenstand, um ihn in sein ursprüngliches Aussehen zurückzuversetzen.
description.fi: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.fil: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.fr: Annule l'effet d'une transmutation sur un objet. Cliquez sur ce parchemin et utilisez-le sur un objet transmuté pour lui rendre sa forme originale.
description.id: Sebuah gulungan mistis yang akan membatalkan efek dari Transmutasi Item. Klik pada gulungan ini dan gunakan pada item yang ditransmutasikan untuk mengembalikannya ke tampilan aslinya.
description.it: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.jp: アイテム変換の効果を元に戻す神秘的な巻物。この巻物をクリックして、変換されたアイテムに使用すると、元の外観に戻ります。
description.kr: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.nl: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.pl: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.ru: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.sp: Pergamino Místico que deshará los efectos de una Transmutación de objetos. Usa este Pergamino en un objeto transmutado para devolverlo a su estado original.
description.sw: A mystical scroll that will undo the effects of an Item Transmutation. Click on this scroll and use it on a transmutated item to return it to it's original look.
description.th: ม้วนคัมภีร์ลึกลับที่จะเลิกทำเอฟเฟกต์ของการเปลี่ยนไอเทม คลิกที่ไอเทมนี้และใช้มันกับไอเท็มที่เปลี่ยนร่างเพื่อคืนให้มันเป็นรูปลักษณ์ดั้งเดิม
description.tw: 一個神秘的捲軸，可以解除物品轉化的效果。點擊此捲軸並將其用於變形項目以使其恢復原始外觀。
description.vi: Một cuộn giấy thần bí sẽ hoàn tác các hiệu ứng của Item Transmutation. Nhấp vào cuộn này và sử dụng nó trên một mục đã chuyển đổi để trả lại hình dạng ban đầu cho nó.
